name: Seong-Tae Kim
content: Seong Tae KimSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationSeong Tae Kim Dr. Seong Tae Kim is an Assistant Professor of Computer Science and Engineering at Kyung Hee University, South Korea. He is a director of Augmented Intelligence Laboratory. Prior to joining Kyung Hee University, he was a senior research scientist in Chair for Computer Aided Medical Procedures at Technical University of Munich, Germany.  He completed the Ph. D. at KAIST Image and Video sYstems Lab. (supervised by Prof. Yong Man Ro), South Korea, in 2019. He received the B.S. degree from Korea University, South Korea, in 2012 and the M.S. degree from KAIST, South Korea, in 2014. In 2015, he was a visiting researcher at the University of Toronto, Canada. His research interests include machine learning, deep learning, explainable AI, interpretability, medical image analysis, and spatio-temporal learning. He is a recipient of Best Student Paper Award (2018) and Honorable Mention Poster Award (2015) from SPIE Medical Imaging, Samsung HumanTech Paper Award (2017), Best 10% Paper Award (2015) from IEEE International Conference on Image Processing, Outstanding Reviewer Award from British Machine Vision Conference (BMVC 2020), and Best Paper Award from Korea Multimedia Society (2012, 2016)  [GoogleScholar] ContactAddress: #508, Electronics & Information College Building,  Kyung Hee University, 1732, Deogyeong-daero, Giheung-gu, Yongin-si, Gyeonggi-do, South KoreaHomepage: https://ami.khu.ac.kr/ Email: st.kim@khu.ac.krPhone: +82 31 201 3761RESEARCH INTERESTSDeep learning based medical image analysis and computer assisted interventionSpecific topicsReliable AI: Interpretability, uncertainty, and robustnessSpatio-temporal deep learning: Longitudinal image analysis, surgical workflow analysisData efficient deep learning: Active learning, self-supervised learning, semi-supervised learning, continuous learning, and learning under noisy dataRESEARCH EXPERIENCEAssistant Professor (2021-Present)Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Kyung Hee University, South KoreaDirector of Augmented Intelligence LaboratorySenior Research Scientist (Mar. 2019-Feb.2021) Chair for Computer Aided Medical Procedures, Department of Informatics, Technische Universität München, München, GermanyWorking with Prof. Nassir Navab Research Assistant (Feb. 2012-Feb.2019)Image and video systems laboratory, Department of Electrical Engineering, KAIST, Daejeon, South KoreaPerformed research supervised by Prof. Yong Man RoVisiting Researcher (Jan. 2015-Mar. 2015)Multimedia laboratory, Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, University of Toronto, Toronto, Ontario, CanadaPerformed research advised by Prof. Konstantinos N.
